svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-07-02T11:10:09.746Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="ESunUMYKHIPexoXDPGCs" version="24.6.4" type="device"> <diagram name="페이지-1" id="D5HgO-Dkw9NRhykbVEi6"> <mxGraphModel dx="1311" dy="1752" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-13" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="130" width="390" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-2" value="" style="shape=datastore;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="892.5" y="170" width="130" height="117" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-4" value="" style="shape=actor;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="160" width="120" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-6" value="" style="shape=mxgraph.cisco.computers_and_peripherals.laptop;html=1;pointerEvents=1;dashed=0;fillColor=#036897;strokeColor=#ffffff;strokeWidth=2;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="-155.5" width="178" height="141" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-7" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Client</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(my app)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="367.5" width="98" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-8" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Resource Owner</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(user)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="48" y="330" width="95" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-9" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Resource Server</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(other service)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="715" y="287" width="125" height="43" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-12" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Authencation</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Server</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="914.5" y="293.5" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-19" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>1. 카카오 로그인&nbsp;</b></font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>버튼 제공</b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="144" y="39" width="128" height="42" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-23" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>2. 로그인 안 되어 있다면,</b></font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>로그인 환경 제공</b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="153" width="176" height="62" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-25" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="550" y="210" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-27" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="649.9999999999998" y="203" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-28" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="168" y="305.41" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="638" y="304.41" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-30" value="<div style="text-align: left;"><b><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">3-1. 요청 URL을 보낸다.</span><br></b></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: initial; text-align: center;"><b>3-2. Server는 URL의 Client_id와 redirect URL을 비교하여 1개라도&nbsp;</b></span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: initial; text-align: center;"><b>다르다면 인증을 종료한다.</b></span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="303" y="230" width="227" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-34" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="159" y="361" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="639" y="361" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-39" value="" style="shape=datastore;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="712.5" y="170" width="130" height="117" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-40" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>4. Server는 scope에 대한 권한을&nbsp;</b></font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>client가 사용해도 되는지 동의를 구한다.</b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="253" y="329" width="321" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-43" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: initial;">client ID : abc</span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">client Secret : 123</font></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="-130" width="150" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-44" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;"><span style="">client ID : abc</span><div style="">client Secret : 123</div><div style="">redirect URL : https://exam/callback</div><div style=""><b>5. user_id : 1</b></div><div style=""><b>5. scope : B,C</b></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="705" y="-10" width="285" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
